name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (Wiggedbucket700)
description:
This game uses  for the game art.

https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack

This is a game i made just for fun!

There are 3 levels in this game and you can collect lots of money and blow up enemies with bombs!

I challenged myself to make the game as fast as possible and i ended up taking 9 hours to make it :D
